label: 588.  Barnwell genealogical chart -- n.d.
description: Barnwell genealogical chart concerning the siblings of Catherine Osborn Barnwell (b. 1874).

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: Data for genealogical chart Please fill in all the spaces with full names. Date of Birth Death (1). Your Aunt: Mary Elliott Barnwell 1850-1921 (2). " Mother: Selina McCarthy Graham 1851-1892 (3). Yourself: Catherine OSborn Barnwell 1874- (4). Your husband: John Clyde Hoke 1868-1938 [Below, in pencil]: Robert Barnwell inft 1910-1910 (5). Your brother: William Graham Barnwell 1876- (6). His wife: Vida Chisholm 1888-1922 (7). Their children: (a). William Graham Barnwell 1910- [Below, in pencil]: Mary Mullins 1911 [illegible] Infantry [illegible] West Point 1934; Mary Mullins 1942 (b). Vida Chisholm 1919- [Below, in pencil]: Waveland Sinclair Fitzsimons 1913-; Vida Barnwell 1941- (c). (d). (8). Your brother: Allard Barnwell 1878-1929 (9). His wife: Edith Arlene 1890- (10). Their children: (a). Helen Nina inft 1911-1911 (b). Allard Fisher 1913 [Below, in pencil]: Vicki Spence 1919- (c). Charles George 1914 [Below, in pencil]: Helen Marie Brennan 1914- (d). Edith Arlene 1917- (11). Your brother: Charles Mathews Barnwell 1879- (12). His wife: Lucilla Lee (13). Their Children: (a). Pauline Lee (b). Charles Mathews [Below, in pencil]: Lieutenant Air Corps, USA (c). James Middleton (d). (14). Your sister: Nina Graham Barnwell 1880- (15). Her Husband: Irvine Keith Heyward 1875-1938 [Below, in pencil]: children (16). Your sister: Anne Stoney Barnwell 1882-1925[End Page 1] Data for genealogical chart Date of Birth Death (17). Her Husband (18). Please check if they have any children. Yes. No. (19). Your sister: Mary Elliott Barnwell 1884-1941 (20). Her Husband: Peyre Gaillard Hanahan 1873- (21). Please check if they have any children. Yes. No. (22). Your brother; Joseph Walker Barnwell 1885- [crossed out] (23). His wife: Peyne Gaillard Hanahan [crossed out] (24). Their children: [apparently refers to (19) and (20)] (a). James Ross 1919- [Below in pencil]: Catherine Barnwell inft. 1921-1921 (b). Julius Barnwell 1924- (c). Your brother Joseph Walker 1885- (25). Your brother George Winchester Barnwell 1889- (26). His wife: Margaret Feltwell Cromwell 1895- (27). Their Children: (a). (b), (c). (d). (28). Your brother: Stephen Elliott Barnwell 1890- (29). His wife: Sarah Skinner 1892- (30). Their children: (a). (b). (c). (d). (31). Along with the above information, please send me the addresses of as many brothers and nephews as you can so that I can find more data about their families, but if you have that information it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you Stephen B. Barnwell[End Page 2]
